page.title: 06Mrs. Day
page.content: Mrs Day told us a lot about the background to the immediate surrounding area. She used to own a pub in the district, so she used to pick up all the little bits of gossip from the people. She doesn't actually live in Trefnant but lives in the immediate district. Wigfair Hall was built 100 years ago and Colonel Howard used to live there, he designed Mulbury Harbour. Most people around the area are tenants of the Wigfair Estate. Her own house was built in 1770 as a one storey cottage. Cefn Caves near there is where the oldest tooth was found, cavemen used to live in the caves. The tooth was excavated by a Victorian archeologist and every year in August archeologists from Cardiff come to dig up the bits that might have been overlooked by the
